places.name: Penha Convent
places.address: R. Vasco Coutinho, s/n - Prainha, Vila Velha - ES
places.description: One of the oldest religious sanctuaries in Brazil, with a breathtaking panoramic view of Vitória and Vila Velha.

places.name: Garoto Chocolate Factory
places.address: Praça Henrique Meyerfreund, 1 - Glória, Vila Velha - ES
places.description: Visit the museum of one of Brazil's most famous chocolate brands and enjoy the factory tour.

places.name: Fonte Grande State Park
places.address: Main access via Rod. Serafim Derenzi - Grande Vitória, Vitória - ES
places.description: An Atlantic Forest reserve in the heart of Vitória, perfect for hiking, ecotourism, and city observation.

places.name: Costa Beach (Praia da Costa)
places.address: Av. Antônio Gil Veloso - Praia da Costa, Vila Velha - ES
places.description: One of the most beautiful and bustling urban beaches, with a vibrant boardwalk and clear waters.

places.name: Goiabeiras Potters
places.address: R. das Paneleiras, 55 - Goiabeiras, Vitória - ES
places.description: Discover the traditional craft of the artisans who produce authentic clay pots, a Brazilian cultural heritage.

places.name: Vale Botanical Park
places.address: Av. dos Expedicionários, s/n - Jardim Camburi, Vitória - ES
places.description: A large green area with an orchidarium, ecological trails, and the state's first Sensory Garden.

places.name: Third Bridge (Terceira Ponte)
places.address: Ponte Deputado Darcy Castello de Mendonça, Vitória - Vila Velha, ES
places.description: An engineering icon connecting the cities of Vitória and Vila Velha, offering spectacular views of the bay.

places.name: Dating Square (Praça dos Namorados)
places.address: Av. Saturnino de Brito - Praia do Canto, Vitória - ES
places.description: An ideal place for a stroll, with craft and food fairs on weekends, and a beautiful sea view.
